slides.title: EVA and Value Creation
slides.content:
# Economic Value Added

## EVA Formula

```
EVA = NOPAT - (Capital x WACC)

NOPAT = Net Operating Profit After Tax
```

## Improvement

| Driver | Action |
|--------|--------|
| Revenue | Increase sales |
| Margin | Improve efficiency |
| Capital | Optimize assets |
| WACC | Reduce cost |

## MVA

```
Market Value Added = Market Value - Book Value
```

slides.title: Target Costing
slides.content:
# Market-Driven Costing

## Process

```
Market Price - Target Profit = Target Cost
```

## Cost Reduction

| Technique | Application |
|-----------|-------------|
| Value engineering | Design phase |
| Value analysis | Production |
| Kaizen | Continuous |

## Steps

1. Market research
2. Target price
3. Target profit
4. Target cost
5. Design to cost

slides.title: Activity-Based Management
slides.content:
# ABM

## ABC Costing

```
1. Identify activities
2. Assign costs to pools
3. Identify cost drivers
4. Calculate rates
5. Apply to products
```

## Value Analysis

| Activity | Assessment |
|----------|------------|
| Value-added | Keep |
| Non-value | Eliminate |

## ABM Applications

- Process improvement
- Product costing
- Customer profitability

slides.title: Responsibility Accounting
slides.content:
# Accountability

## Centers

| Center | Responsible For |
|--------|----------------|
| Cost | Costs only |
| Revenue | Revenue only |
| Profit | Both |
| Investment | Profit + assets |

## Controllability

```
Evaluate only on controllable items
```

## Investment Center

| Measure | Formula |
|---------|--------|
| ROI | Income / Assets |
| RI | Income - Capital Charge |
